name: Spedex
description:
Spedex is a frustrating reaction game. Listen, it's your job to make sure the distribution center runs in tip-top shape, even if that means a headache or two. Use your keyboard to collect, sort, and organize packages to make the factory flow freely. Boxes fall faster over time, requiring you to have increasingly better reactions.

Windows download:

https://www.microsoft.com/en-us/p/spedex/9pfn4zl6jtkj

Angent Softworks blog:

https://angentsoftworks.blogspot.com/

Marathon: Collect boxes as they fall before they hit the bottom, without trying to clear lanes that have no boxes.

Sort: Sort packages by shape, then by color. Sort packages before they pass the turning lanes,
while keeping an eye on new packages!

Beat your marathon highscore. Beat your friend's highscore. Don't worry about your highscore. Do whatever you want.
